[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][image_with_animation image_url=”7610″ alignment=”” animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default” img_link=”https://www.drivingsales.com/dealersatisfactionawards”][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”3/4″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]Customer satisfaction has and will always be our top priority. Thank you to all that voted, we are honored!

Ranked #1 in Dealer Satisfaction, Fixed Ops Digital wins award in Fixed Ops Tools Category.

Receiving Top Rated Fixed Ops Tools Award in the 11th annual DrivingSales Dealer Satisfaction Award, as determined by the thousands of auto dealers who are part of the DrivingSales.com community.

“In our eleventh year of presenting these awards, we feel especially proud that DrivingSales Vendor Ratings continues to help dealers make smart and informed decisions through thousands of peer reviews that lead them to outstanding service providers such as Fixed Ops Digital. We’re thrilled their Drive Service Solution has been recognized as one of the best by the people to whom their services count the most: the dealer community,” says DrivingSales CEO & Founder Jared Hamilton.

Full award results[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”15″][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” url=”/demo/” text=”Get Started Today”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

yoast_head_json.title: DrivingSales Dealer Satisfaction Award Winner - Fixed Ops Digital
yoast_head_json.og_description: Ranked #1 in Dealer Satisfaction, Fixed Ops Digital wins award in Fixed Ops Tools Category.

@graph.name: DrivingSales Dealer Satisfaction Award Winner - Fixed Ops Digital
Julie Branum
@graph.description: Julie has a decade of experience in the car business and marketing specifically for manufacturer dealerships in the U.S. Utilizing best practices and her background in design, Julie believes in presenting and converting dealerships online visitors into high RO Service and Parts Department customers.
